attributes.action: No GCSE exam on 14th/15th June as it is a religious festival
attributes.background: Muslims are fasting throughout the whole entire exam period. Eid has been given as a reward for those who have fasted. So they should have the day off. GCSE period is very stressful but to have it on a day of celebration is wrong.

rejection.details: Decisions about the dates of exams are taken by exam boards, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
